fields_of_interest: Education and training, Research and innovation
eu_initiatives: Research, science and innovation, intellectual property, academic research, standardisation, digital single market
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
goals__remit: 4iP Council is a European research council dedicated to developing high quality academic insight and empirical evidence on topics related to intellectual property and innovation. Our research is multi-industry, cross sector and technology focused. We work with academia, policy makers and regulators to facilitate a deeper understanding of the invention process and of technology investment decision-making.
